name: The Caretaker Hotel
description:
Welcome to the Caretaker Hotel

You can't recall going through the receptionist, but you do already have your room key in hand. Maybe you’ll find your lodging on another floor.

This project was created for a class assignment. This is my first attempt at doing anything like this. So, if you experience any problems or bugs. Please let me know. Also, if you have any ideas, suggestions, or other comments. Please feel free to send me any and all constructive criticism.

DISCLAIMER

This game was created out of inspiration from the music album

  “Everywhere At The End Of Time”

created by Leyland James Kirby. 

Along with the cover art from Ivan Seal.

The media in the game is transformative and uses no more of the original content than needed.

The intention of this game is to give an interpretation of the same topic covered by the previously mentioned album. All respect goes to the original creators.

If you haven't already. I highly recommend you experience “Everywhere At The End Of Time” for yourself. It’s an incredible listen.
